scripts.package:mcp: mkdir -p dist/mcp && cd packages/mcp-server && npm pack --pack-destination ../../dist/mcp
scripts.package:extension: mkdir -p dist/extension && cd packages/extension && npm run package && mv *.vsix ../../dist/extension/
